cards.name: Loki
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace your deck with your opponent's starting deck. Give those cards -1 Cost and draw a card.

cards.name: Leech
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the text from 6-Cost cards in your opponent’s hand.

cards.name: Doctor Octopus
cards.ability: On Reveal: Pull the lowest-Power card from your opponent’s hand to their side of this location.

cards.name: Widow's Kiss
cards.ability: Ongoing: This has -3 Power. Disable this ability if your side of this location is full.

cards.name: Blob
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 13 or more Power.

cards.name: War Machine
cards.ability: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

cards.name: Apocalypse
cards.ability: When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.

items.title: Deadpool's Diner
items: Earn 'Bubs' to obtain Cassandra Nova for free

items.title: Refer-A-Friend
items: 1 Tutorial Finished: Exclusive “Marvel Messiah” Title
1 Tutorial Finished + 1 Welcome Bundle Purchased: Premium Mystery Variant
1 Tutorial Finished + 1 Premium Season Pass Purchased: Exclusive Domino Variant

items.title: Conquerors
items: Support your favorite Creators to win an Elektra Variant and Credits!

items.title: Alliances
items: Join or form alliances to earn rewards together

items.title: Deadpool League
items: Get matched into groups of 30 similar players to compete on a short-term leaderboard for prizes

items.name: Blob
changes: 6/0 – On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 15 or more Power. Ongoing: Can’t be moved.
6/0 – On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 15 or more Power.

items.name: Mockingbird
changes: 5/9 – Costs 1 less for each of your cards in play that didn’t start in your deck.

items.name: Hydra Bob
changes: 1/4 – After each turn, this moves if a player Snapped.

items.name: Ravonna Renslayer
changes: 2/3 – Ongoing: Your cards with 1 or less Power cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

items.name: Viper
changes: 3/5 – On Reveal: One of your other cards here switches sides.
3/5 – On Reveal: One of your other cards here with the lowest Power switches sides.

items.name: Sauron
changes: 3/3 – On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.

items.name: Werewolf By Night
changes: 3/1 – After you play a card, move there to gain +2 Power if it has an On Reveal.

items.name: Hit-Monkey
changes: 3/2 – On Reveal: Gain +2 Power for each other card you played this turn.

items.name: Lockjaw
changes: 4/5 – After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck. (once per turn)
4/4 – After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck.

items.name: Uatu
changes: 1/2 - At the start of the game, shows the right location to you.
1/2 - At the start of the game, shows unrevealed locations to you.

items.name: Moon Knight
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: Discard a card from each player’s hand.
3/3 - On Reveal: Discard a card with an even Cost from each player's hand.

items.name: Shadow King
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Set all cards here to their base Power.
No text change; setting no longer considered raising or lowering Power.

items.name: Blink
changes: 5/7 - On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a higher-Cost card from your deck.
5/7 - On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a card that costs more from your deck.

items.name: Yondu
changes: 1/2 - On Reveal: Destroy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's deck.
1/2 - On Reveal: Destroy the card that costs the least in your opponent's deck.

items.name: Colleen Wing
changes: 2/4 - On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.
2/4 - On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the least from your hand.

items.name: Black Bolt
changes: 5/7 - On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your opponent's hand.
5/7 - On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the least from your opponent's hand.

items.name: Lady Sif
changes: 3/5 - On Reveal: Discard the highest-cost card from your hand.
3/5 - On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the most from your hand.

items.name: White Queen
changes: 4/6 - On Reveal: Copy the highest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
4/6 - On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the most from your opponent's hand into your hand.

items.name: Jane Foster
changes: 5/9 - On Reveal: Draw all cards that Cost 0 from your deck.
5/9 - On Reveal: Draw all cards that cost 0 from your deck.

items.name: Mirage
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Copy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.
2/2 - On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the least from your opponent's hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.

items.name: Throne Room
changes: Card(s) here with the highest Power have their Power doubled.
The highest-Power card(s) here have their Power doubled.

items.name: Loki
changes: 4/5 - On Reveal: Transform your hand into cards from your opponent’s starting deck and give them -1 Cost.
3/5 - On Reveal: Replace your deck with your opponent's starting deck. Give those cards -1 Cost and draw a card.

items.name: Leech
changes: 5/5 - On Reveal: Remove the text from cards with On Reveal abilities in your opponent’s hand.
4/4 - On Reveal: Remove the text from 6-Cost cards in your opponent’s hand.

items.name: Doctor Octopus
changes: 5/10 - On Reveal: Pull 4 cards from your opponent’s hand to their side of this location.
4/8 - On Reveal: Pull the lowest-Power card from your opponent’s hand to their side of this location.

items.name: Widow's Kiss (White Widow)
changes: 0/0 - Ongoing: This has -4 Power. Disable this ability if your side of this location is full.
0/0 - Ongoing: This has -3 Power. Disable this ability if your side of this location is full.

items.name: Blob
changes: 6/0 - On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 15 or more Power.
6/0 - On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 13 or more Power.

items.name: War Machine
changes: 4/6 - On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

items.name: Apocalypse
changes: 6/6 - When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.
